name: The Last Known Cure
description:
Made in 2 weeks for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 (had tried to do this game jam before but failed) A horrible global disease had been spreading everywhere, turned everyone into mindless  - aggressive creatures. The infected creatures are dangerous, aggressive and can possibly mutate. You are one of the luckiest people(you overslept) that haven't been infected. Your main(and only) mission now is to delivering the cure samples(2 samples needed) to the surface to start duplicating and spread it to everyone. (omfg im so bad at writing) Controls: Click anywhere to move Scroll to zoom in - out E to interact with stuff Right-click to throw potions Backspace to restart game (in case if you were softlocked) (HTML version should be played in fullscreen) (Windows version is more stable(and runs on 60 fps) ) Soundtracks by RHYTHMMASTER.

hardmodeishiddeninoneofthewalls
